name: Two Days at Barrels
description:
__ TWO DAYS AT BARRELS__

Hey fellow person ! We're a very well respected company "Barrel Entertainment Co.". Our Barrels entertain people daily ! So, to keep the joy going, we're looking for a night guard to work on the shift between 12 AM to 6AM on Thursday and Friday this week. Depending on the criterias you will be informed about once you apply, you will be given a revenue of about USD$20-30 for each night. Press the button labeled "Download Now" to apply ! What could possibly go wrong ? (in fact that's a question totally worth asking)

Credits :

Sounds and other tracks : freesound.org, youtube.com as well as Google Translate's Text-to-speech The rest : me

Made for fun, graphics are made horribly on purpose, I also used Scratch on purpose, just to make a better april fools joke

btw, if you happen to have noticed any bug, please write a comment about it, i'll then update the game.

Donations have been disabled for this game since it's a fan game :P
